name: Daspert Software
tag_list: drupal, html5, mobile, ios, sproutcore, alfresco, open-source, pmp, outsourcing, wordpress, website
overview:
Daspert is a multinational company providing complete web and mobile solutions built on the most robust open source platforms. We excel in Drupal and HTML5 development wrapped in perfectly tailored responsive designs. Our industry specific knowledge covers from legal, financial services, to digital media and sport.

Our Mission

To be the most responsive software company to market specific turnarounds achieving tremendous benefits to our goals oriented customers.

Our Vision

Transforming business from an extension of life into an enriching part of it. We blend the talents of the most diligent software engineers and engineering managers with the passion of the customers to write daily success stories to the international business hall of fame. We are strongly driven by an authentic desire to develop the potential and dreams of each and every employee and customer.

Why Choose Daspert?

Since its inception in 2008, Daspert continually refined and developed strategies to become a leading software solutions provider. We integrate complex technologies and a wide range of services to satisfy our customers’ needs for effective solutions. In order to ensure accurate communication we make sure that all our processes are completely defined and implemented.

Key Strengths

PMP certified project managers Certified software engineers with high technology expertise Call-on-demand presence of a large talent pool with varied skill-sets in a wide spectrum of technologies. Flexibility to choose our onshore or offshore resources. Local project management that eliminates cultural and time-zone barriers and ensures better accountability and greater quality of work. No additional overhead costs involved in hiring our programmers, we take care of administrative and HR requirements. The most competitive rates in the industry with a wide range of payment options suiting every requirement. Our developers seamlessly integrate with the existing team and processes to ensure shorter development cycle. We secure your Intellectual Property through strict processes and Non-Disclosure Agreements
